channel.title: 742 jar stuck at checking for updates
channel.description: Hey, so I've been trying forever to figure this out. Essentially what happens is this, when I jar the client it doesn't load. But when I load it through server+client bats it works... the ips are on 127.0.0.1. I'm well aware that portforwarded ips do this. Anyway, something else I noticed is that when I run the run.bat in my server files with the jarred client it works. I can only assume that means its not loading the server. Also, it did this before I updated cache. Old cache was 718. Thanks in advance

item.title: 742 jar stuck at checking for updates
item.dc:creator: @ryz ryz
item.source: 742 jar stuck at checking for updates

item.title: 742 jar stuck at checking for updates
item.dc:creator: @ryz ryz
item.description:
@ryz wrote:

Hey, so I’ve been trying forever to figure this out. Essentially what happens is this, when I jar the client it doesn’t load. But when I load it through server+client bats it works… the ips are on 127.0.0.1. I’m well aware that portforwarded ips do this. Anyway, something else I noticed is that when I run the run.bat in my server files with the jarred client it works. I can only assume that means its not loading the server. Also, it did this before I updated cache. Old cache was 718.
Thanks in advance
